titles.title: Qualified Long-term Care Fairness Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for qualified long-term care services in computing adjusted gross income.
Qualified Long-term Care Fairness Act of 2007

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Qualified Long-term Care Fairness Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax deduction from gross income for the cost of long-term care services and long-term care insurance contracts.
